name: SpeechSynthesisUtterance.pitch
description: The pitch property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface gets and sets the pitch at which the utterance will be spoken at.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The pitch property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface gets and sets the pitch at which the utterance will be spoken at.

If unset, a default value of 1 will be used.
